data.message: I need help. Someone hacked my account and is using my name and sending messages about grant money and UPS. I have reported as fraud and others did also and the only response is that it does not violate Facebook standards

replies.message: Hey Brenda. If you think someone has logged into your account without your permission, we recommend that you secure it right away. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2zkB8Ns.  Malware can also sometimes cause your account to post things without your knowledge. To learn more, please visit: on.fb.me/1fTr2lt. -Kiara

Facebook I did that. My friends are accepting friend requests from the hacked account that I have been told does not violate your standards. Now the hacked account is sending messages about a grant program which I'm sure is some type of scam using my info
